head.title: No Listings, But at Least It's Comfy

hedline.hl1: No Listings, But at Least It's Comfy

block.p: Boost is an amusing new seat for the younger set, who need a little extra help reaching the dinner table. A departure from the traditional booster seat -- and the old-fashioned (and outmoded) stack of phone books -- Boost is a block of dense foam printed with an image of the Yellow Pages. Slightly form-fitted to accommodate a child, this new take on the booster seat fits most chairs; $22 at Mxyplyzyk, 125 Greenwich Avenue (13th Street), (800) 243-9810 or mxyplyzyk.com.
